description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate & Cinnamon Puddings recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate & Cinnamon Puddings Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g Nestle Bakers' Choice Dark Choc Melts

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fan forced. Sift flour, hazelnut meal, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon and 2 tbsp of Nestle baking cocoa into a bowl. Add milk, melted Nestle dark choc melts, butter, egg and vanilla and mix well to combine.

Spoon into 6 x 3/4 cupcapacity (190mL) oven-proof dishes and place on a baking tray. Place the extra sugar and remaining cocoa in a bowl and mix to combine. Sprinkle over the puddings and pour over 1 cup (250mL) boiling water. Bake for 12–15 minutes or until the tops are firm. Serve with ice cream if desired.
